item.title: 19 years ago today, ‘HARRY POTTER AND THE PRISONER OF AZKABAN’ was released in theaters.

item.title: The first trailer for Emma Seligman’s ‘BOTTOMS’ starring Ayo Edebiri and Rachel Sennott will be released this Monday.

item.title: Spider-Man: Across the #SpiderVerse is now playing in theaters.

item.title: Rebecca Ferguson photographed by Royal Gilbert for Vogue Hong Kong

item.title:
There is already a finished script for a sequel to ‘THE FLASH.’
It has yet to be greenlit.
(https://variety.com/2023/film/news/the-flash-release-ezra-miller-premiere-secret-ending-sequel-1235632040/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Ezra Miller has reportedly done no press for ‘THE FLASH’ and will reportedly make a low-profile appearance at the Los Angeles premiere, only posing for photos rather than doing any interviews.
(https://variety.com/2023/film/news/the-flash-release-ezra-miller-premiere-secret-ending-sequel-1235632040/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: ‘SPIDER-MAN: ACROSS THE SPIDER-VERSE’ has received an A CinemaScore from audiences.
item.author: FilmUpdates
